document.full_text: vancouver canucks center manny malhotra is out for the rest of the regular season and playoffs with an eye injury that required surgery, the team announced monday.
document.title: canucks lose center manny malhotra for season with eye injury
lines_and_colors: vancouver canucks center manny malhotra is out for the rest of the regular season and playoffs with an eye injury that required surgery, the team announced monday.
